name: Challenge #7: Multiple passengers
description: In this challenge four Passengers are are spread between several different cities. They all want to go to City "D". Make it happen in under 12 seconds! That's your objective.
helpText: Supplying arrays as arguments to <c>Vehicle</c>'s <m c="Vehicle">moveTo</m>, <m c="Vehicle">load</m> and <m c="Vehicle">unload</m> is an good way to make this challenge easy;
The <m c="Vehicle">unload</m> method can be called without arguments to drop everyone from the <c>Vehicle</c>;
There's only a single winning path in this challenge;

victory.text: Deliver all the passengers to their desired destination.
victory.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, game) { console.log(game); return game.passengersDelivered == 4 }

defeat.text: Timer must not go over 12 seconds
defeat.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, game) { return game.elapsedTimeSeconds > 12; }
